title: WeOrder for Business (Waiter)
description: WeOrder is a revolutionary web/mobile platform designed for both venue customers and venue managers.Quick orders (in-venue, for delivery or takeout) and mobile payments included, everything hassle free.WeOrder for business is a part of WeOrder software suite specifically designed to help venues (and waiters)manage the whole ordering process using an Android tablet, here are some of the best features:- quick and easy (very easy) ordering system- it works great on a smartphone, it works even better on a 7 inches tablet- ready to print on any remote or embedded printer- higly integrated with WeOrder backend software to manage orders, menus and payments- Wearable integration (manage the orders from your wrist)http://www.weorder.comhttps://www.facebook.com/weordernow
descriptionHTML:
WeOrder is a revolutionary web/mobile platform designed for both venue customers and venue managers.
Quick orders (in-venue, for delivery or takeout) and mobile payments included, everything hassle free.


WeOrder for business is a part of WeOrder software suite specifically designed to help venues (and waiters)
manage the whole ordering process using an Android tablet, here are some of the best features:
- quick and easy (very easy) ordering system
- it works great on a smartphone, it works even better on a 7 inches tablet
- ready to print on any remote or embedded printer
- higly integrated with WeOrder backend software to manage orders, menus and payments
- Wearable integration (manage the orders from your wrist)


http://www.weorder.com
https://www.facebook.com/weordernow
